attributes.title: IMPORTANT
attributes.review:
Narrator: It is raining today. So Peppa and George cannot play outside. 

Peppa Pig: Daddy, it's stopped raining. 

Peppa Pig: Can we go out to play? 

Daddy Pig: All right, run along you two. 

(Peppa and George hurry outside.) 

Both: (Laughing). 

Narrator: Peppa loves jumping in muddy puddles. 

Peppa Pig: I love muddy puddles (Laughs). 

Mummy Pig: Peppa. If you jump in muddy puddles, you must wear your boots. 

Peppa Pig: Sorry, Mummy. 

(Peppa takes off her shoes and puts on her boots.) 

Narrator: George likes to jump in muddy puddles, too. 

Peppa Pig: George. If you jump in muddy puddles, you must wear your boots. 

(George runs off.) 

Narrator: Peppa likes to look after her little brother, George. 

(George came back with his boots.) 

Both: (Laughing). 

Peppa Pig: George, let's find some more puddles. 

Narrator: Peppa and George are having a lot of fun. Peppa has found a little puddle. George has found a big puddle. 

Peppa Pig: Look, George. There's a really big puddle. 

Narrator: George wants to jump into the big puddle first. 

Peppa Pig: Stop, George. I must check if it's safe for you. 

(Peppa jumps in and eventually, gets George all muddy.) 

Peppa Pig: Good. It is safe for you. 

George: (Cries). 

Peppa Pig: Sorry, George. It's only mud. 

George: (Laughs). 

Both: (Laughing). 

Narrator: Peppa and George love jumping in muddy puddles. 

Peppa Pig: Come on, George.Let's go and show Daddy. 

Daddy Pig: Goodness me. 

Peppa Pig: Daddy. Daddy. 

Peppa Pig: Guess what we've been doing. 

Daddy Pig: Let me think... 

Daddy Pig: Have you been watching television? 

Peppa Pig: No. No. Daddy. 

Daddy Pig: Have you just had a bath? 

Peppa Pig: No. No. 

Daddy Pig: I know. You've been jumping in muddy puddles. 

Peppa Pig: Yes. Yes. Daddy. We've been jumping in muddy puddles. 

Daddy Pig: Ho. Ho. And look at the mess you're in. 

Peppa Pig: Oooh... 

Daddy Pig: Oh, well, it's only mud. 

Daddy Pig: Let's clean up quickly before Mummy sees the mess. 

Peppa Pig: Daddy, when we've cleaned up, will you and Mummy come and play, too? 

Daddy Pig: Yes, we can all play in the garden. 

Narrator: Peppa and George are wearing their boots. 

Narrator: Mummy and Daddy are wearing their boots. 

Narrator: Peppa loves jumping up and down in muddy puddles. 

Narrator: Everyone loves jumping up and down in muddy puddles. 

(Suddenly, Daddy Pig slips and gets all muddy.) 

All: (Gasping). 

Mummy Pig: Oh, Daddy Pig, look at the mess you're in. 

Peppa Pig: It's only mud. 

Daddy Pig: (Laughs). 

All: (Laughing).

attributes.title: Terrible App
attributes.review: I wish the App Store had an option to rate apps with a 0, because this is what this app deserves. Every time I open the app for 2 minutes my screen turns black and it takes me off the app. Like I can’t even use this stupid app time. What a waste!!

attributes.title: DONT GET ✨😓🤢🥺🧚
attributes.review: So I decided to download this app. And I DO NOT RECOMMEND and here’s why. First of all it took a whole week for it to download on my phone which I thought was unacceptable. Like it just took an incredibly long amount of time to download. Second of all, my phone got a bug because of it. And the bud got so bad that my phone would just turn off. So I took it to the App Store and they took a look at it and as soon as they shook my phone an actual ROACH came crawling out of my speaker. Then it yelled “TRUMP 2020.” So I laughed, but apparently that made it angry. So it grew and grew until it’s big crusty looking forehead busted through ceiling of the apple store. Then it started chasing everyone around the store and parking lot. I ran to my phone to delete the app but it told me I had to pay 70,000,000 dollars to get it removed, AND I WAS SHOCKED HUNNY I WAS IN TEARS ALMOST. It also gave me the option to use a password. I figured out what it was through my great great grandfather’s Friend’s cousin’s sister’s dog’s friend’s owner. (Its: ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ 🤷sometimes✨i🙁don't😢wanna😱be😼happy🧚don't✋hold😇it🤪against😈me🙆) btw just to help ya 😉. But yea def don’t recommend 🤢

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS!!!!!
attributes.review: i downloaded this app recently to show my loyalty to this Great country and was DISGUSTED by what followed. as soon as i opened this app i was greeted by a message in MEXICAN!!!! this is america we speak american here! then i received a phone call from a chinese man! i then started receiving texts from a foreign number pushing the liberal left agenda! every time i opened this app it would show me “statistics” and “facts” and “quotes” sullying the name of my beloved donald trump! fake news! this app spreads false information! my conclusion is this: the app has been taken over by ANTIFA and IMMIGRANTS😡😡😡!
